official_title: To designate the seven-day period commencing October 7, 1990, and ending October 13, 1990, as "National Aviation Education Week".

summary.text: Designates October 7 through 13, 1990, as National Aviation Education Week.

titles.title: To designate the seven-day period commencing October 7, 1990, and ending October 13, 1990, as "National Aviation Education Week".
